text:
Algorithmia | Sr. Software Engineer - Platform | REMOTE + ONSITE | Fulltime

Algorithmia is "DevOps for AI". The Algorithmia engineering team is responsible for building the Algorithmia platform, a highly-available distributed platform that runs the public algorithm marketplace on Algorithmia.com as well as large AI/ML workloads for our enterprise customers. Platform engineers build features and work with cloud providers to ensure our system is the most stable, highly-available, and feature-rich platform for AI/ML. Our stack includes Kubernetes, Docker, and various Java (Scala) microservices and backing stores.

https://algorithmia.bamboohr.com/jobs/view.php?id=34
